articles.title: US considers redesignating Houthis as ‘terror’ group after ship seizure - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: White House had reversed designation against rebel group in 2021 to help get aid to war-torn Yemen.
articles.content:
The White House says it is considering redesignating Yemens Houthi rebels as a terrorist group after they claimed the seizure of a commercial ship in the Red Sea.
